alert.note: Alert for Clay (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 9:09PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Greene and southwestern Clay Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 909 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Peach Orchard, or 9 miles southwest of Corning, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lafe, Knobel, Peach Orchard, Delaplaine, Beech Grove, Brookings, Knob and Stonewall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
